document.title: Deploy a Hama cluster on EC2

body.p: This document describes how to deploy Hama clusters on Clouds e.g., EC2, Rackspace using Whirr.

subsection.name: Deploy a Hama cluster on EC2

body.p:
The following commands install Whirr and start a 5 node Hama cluster on Amazon EC2 in 5 minutes or less.
% curl -O http://www.apache.org/dist/whirr/whirr-0.x.0/whirr-0.x.0.tar.gz % tar zxf whirr-0.x.0.tar.gz; cd whirr-0.x.0
% export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=YOUR_ID % export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=YOUR_SECKEY % ssh-keygen -t rsa -P '' -f ~/.ssh/id_rsa_whirr
% bin/whirr launch-cluster --config recipes/hama-ec2.properties --private -key-file ~/.ssh/id_rsa_whirr
